title: Hidden Play
description: Moving to a new school senior year is hard enough, but when Aiden’s eyes continue to land on the one person that is all wrong for him – a fellow teammate who won’t give him the time of day – things get complicated. Quickly.Will Aiden survive his final year of high school? Will he be able to balance being true to himself while still trying to fit in with the pressures of senior year?Or will he fall apart completely, succumbing to a lust that is beyond his control?
author: HarlemDiggity
